Thanks for that info!

Of course I don't mind sharing

I'm trying to do the following:

Grab plain-text-only content out of 8 specific web-sites
Then parse the fetched ARC files using perl
I want to insert certain parsed information from the ARC files into
a MYSQL database and then build a PHP interface for users to search
into that database

But I want to automate the process as automated as can be
So, I need to start jobs using cron schedules
Another thing I'd like to do is crawl more jobs that one at a time
But by reading some messages from the list-archive, I understood that
I need to have different heritrix installations to do this. I cannot
do it with one. Is that true? Is that an easier way to do this?
